articles.content:

articles.author: Ryan Whitwam
articles.title: Epic Grudgingly Releases Fortnite for Android on Google Play Store - ExtremeTech
articles.description: Epic's success with Fortnite has given it enough power to push changes in the gaming industry with the Epic Store. Its options on mobile are much more restricted, though. After fighting with Google for more than a year, Epic has relented and added Fortnite to…
articles.content: Fortnite is the most popular video game on the planet, and while most people are playing on computers and consoles, the mobile version is surprisingly in vogue as well. Epic’s success with Fortnite has given it enough power to push changes in the gaming indus… [+2065 chars]

articles.author: Dan Thorp-Lancaster
articles.title: Lenovo's budget IdeaPad 5 with latest AMD Ryzen CPUs now available - Windows Central
articles.description: Lenovo's new IdeaPad 5 is now up for grab in both the U.S. and UK. Starting at around £405 or $690 depending on your model, the laptop is a budget affair, but it should still pack plenty of power thanks to AMD's latest mobile chips.
articles.content: Lenovo has a new budget laptop on the scene, and it's chocked full of new AMD goodness. The new Lenovo IdeaPad 5 is now on sale in both the U.S. and UK, bringing AMD's latest Ryzen 4000 Series chips at a price that doesn't break the bank. You can currently sc… [+995 chars]

articles.description: As Nintendo investigates reports of account breaches, the company has recommended turning on 2FA. Here's how.

articles.description: Buttons hewn from battleship-grey stone the way they should be, right?

articles.description: BT, VIRGIN Media, Sky and many other broadband customers have just received some good news as it's revealed that UK download speeds are finally getting faster.
